title: Multimedia Multimodal Science Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Interactive learning environments enabled by digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can visually and auditorily represent scientific concepts using various multimedia tools.
Learners can simplify and reconstruct complex scientific theories through reciprocal teaching strategies.
Learners can deepen their conceptual understanding by manipulating and observing scientific phenomena in a VR simulation environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
